extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of ELEC353 and (ELEC323 or MATH332) and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.

basic.description: Topics include; an introduction to noise and distortion in electronic circuits, analysis and design of biasing circuits, references, ADCs and DACs, power amps, mixers, modulators and PLLs along with a short introduction to analog filter design.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Analog Electronics
